Description:
Tbot Techno Systems, a leading IT Solutions and Services company, is seeking an experienced Sr. Sales Manager to develop and implement sales strategies that drive revenue growth. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing a team of sales professionals and ensuring that the company's sales goals are met. With an impressive customer base that includes renowned organizations such as L&T, Tata Group of Companies, Amazon, IBM, Siemens, Wipro, and many others, you will lead the sales efforts to grow the customer base and expand into new markets. As a trusted partner with the world's leading IT Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs), Tbot Techno Systems enables you to offer a diverse range of IT solutions to meet your clients' evolving needs.Create and implement effective sales strategies.
Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships.
Lead, coach, and manage a team of sales professionals, setting individual and team targets.
Develop and maintain a sales pipeline that ensures attainment of company sales targets.
Develop pricing strategies to maximize profits and market share.
Work collaboratively with internal departments to ensure customer satisfaction and the timely delivery of solutions.
Gather market feedback to develop new product and service offerings.Job Details
